Format.ReportTitle: Household Population 10 Years Old and Over by Sex and Age

SQL.SQLRaw: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') AS AGE, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >10 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS MALES, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >10 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS FEMALES, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >10 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS TOTAL_SEXES FROM cap_citizen WHERE DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y')>10 GROUP BY AGE union all select 'Total', SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 200 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13'),SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 10 AND 200 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >10) FROM cap_citizen

QueryColumn.Name: MALES
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >10 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: FEMALES
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >10 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: TOTAL_SEXES
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >10 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS
